attributes.action: Allow water meters for single people or at least allow them ' Assessed Household Charge' reductions on Council Estaes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hello mr Brown !
My petition is for single people or small groups of 'Council Tenants' to be  allowed  to have  water meters or at least allow them ' Assessed Household Charge' reductions. As well you might know that there is and will be greater pressure on Water in the South East of England now and worse still in the future.. Please help in the name of fairness,  as my next door neighbour has one only because she is a 'Leaseholder on our council estate=NOT FAIR or ENVIRONMENTALLY SOUND either. Thank you for this opprtunity to communicate with you direct+ GREAT STUFF!!
David B. Taylor
